function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Building solutions not directly reducing transmission of SARS-CoV-2 or other viruses","Impact":"Limited reduction in COVID-19 risk and potential impact on public health","Mitigation":"Implementing additional measures to directly reduce viral transmission, promoting public health initiatives","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV germicidal irradiation, improved ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Adverse effects of the COVID-19 outbreak on the environment","Impact":"Increase in viral wastewater contaminations, medical waste, and social poverty","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce chemical reagent use, improve waste management, and address social poverty","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, waste management technologies, social welfare programs","People":"General public, environmental agencies, social welfare organizations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government, social welfare organizations"}]}
